title: Cosmic Skateboard
summaries: The Cosmic Skateboard is a Hardmode, post-Golem pet-summoning item that spawns an Alien Skater to follow the player around. When the player is far enough away or in midair, the Alien Skater turns its skateboard into a rocket-powered hoverboard to catch up to them. The Cosmic Skateboard has a 1/4 (25%) chance of dropping from the Martian Saucer in Master Mode.

statistics.Tooltip:
Summons an alien skater
'Kickflips are a lot easier in Zero-G!'
statistics.Sell: 5 GC
